verses.name: Numbers 1:4
verses.text: And with you there shall be a man of every tribe; every one head of the house of his fathers.

verses.name: Numbers 1:5
verses.text: And these are the names of the men that shall stand with you: of the tribe of Reuben; Elizur the son of Shedeur.

verses.name: Numbers 1:6
verses.text: Of Simeon; Shelumiel the son of Zurishaddai.

verses.name: Numbers 1:7
verses.text: Of Judah; Nahshon the son of Amminadab.

verses.name: Numbers 1:8
verses.text: Of Issachar; Nethaneel the son of Zuar.

verses.name: Numbers 1:9
verses.text: Of Zebulun; Eliab the son of Helon.

verses.name: Numbers 1:10
verses.text: Of the children of Joseph: of Ephraim; Elishama the son of Ammihud: of Manasseh; Gamaliel the son of Pedahzur.

verses.name: Numbers 1:11
verses.text: Of Benjamin; Abidan the son of Gideoni.
